overview: Charli Deville is the "king of drag kings". As she prepares to get on stage, Coco erases her womanly features with makeup and creates Charli. She asks herself about virility and how she feels when she becomes Charli. Her voice is intertwined to Clark's, a transgender man. He wonders about the role of drag kings and what it means to be a man.
title: Cocky King
